thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Thursday, 11 Jan 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-Hangzhou TianMuShan Pharmaceutical Enterprise unit obtains high-tech enterprise recognition again

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Hangzhou TianMuShan Pharmaceutical Enterprise unit obtains high-tech enterprise recognition again

organizations.name: hangzhou tianmushan pharmaceutical enterprise co ltd

text:
Jan 11 (Reuters) - Hangzhou TianMuShan Pharmaceutical Enterprise Co Ltd
* Says Huangshan-based pharmaceutical unit was recognized as high-tech enterprise again and could enjoy a tax preference of 15 percent, from 2017 to 2019
Source text in Chinese: goo.gl/z6tm3b
Further company coverage: (Beijing Headline News)
Our Standards: The Thomson Reuters Trust Principles.
